main event: A local businessman in Olive Hill, Kentucky observed a single metallic-looking object in the sky on April 3, 1961, for 2-3 minutes.
interesting points: The object was described as oblong, silver, and estimated to be 50 to 60 feet in length., The object was moving at a very high speed at an altitude of 4,000 to 5,000 feet., The witness was identified as a reliable local businessman., No other witnesses were reported for this sighting., The object changed direction and velocity rapidly, demonstrating maneuvers indicative of intelligence.
